children.description: Child content that is manged by this component.
children.name: children

defaultOpen.description:
This sets the default open state of the disclosure.
By default the disclosure is closed.
For use when the component is being used as an Uncontrolled Component.
defaultOpen.name: defaultOpen

onToggle.description: Callback that is called when the disclosure is toggled.
onToggle.name: onToggle

open.description: Used to make the disclosure a Controlled Component.
open.name: open

title.description:
Title for the disclosure pane.
If ReactElement[] is provided, it must be wrapped in a container element (not a Fragment).
title.name: title

type.name: string | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>> | ReactElement<any, string | JSXElementConstructor<any>>[]

UNSAFE_className.description:
**Use at your own risk:** Custom classNames for specific elements. This should only be used as a
**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the [Customizing components Guide](https://atlantis.getjobber.com/guides/customizing-components).
UNSAFE_className.name: UNSAFE_className

type.name: { container?: string; summary?: string; summaryWrap?: string | undefined; title?: { textStyle?: string | undefined; } | undefined; icon?: { svg?: string | undefined; path?: string | undefined; } | undefined; arrowIconWrapper?: string | undefined; content?: string | undefined; } | undefined

UNSAFE_style.description:

**last resort**. Using this may result in unexpected side effects.
More information in the [Customizing components Guide](https://atlantis.getjobber.com/guides/customizing-components).
UNSAFE_style.name: UNSAFE_style
